reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 203/18: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO APPROVE PLANS OF SUBDIVISION - HURON SHORES, KIRKLAND LAKE AND MATACHEWAN
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO APPROVE PLANS OF SUBDIVISION - HURON SHORES, KIRKLAND LAKE AND MATACHEWAN
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. The Minister’s authority under section 51 of the Act to approve plans of subdivision is delegated to, (a) the Municipality of Huron Shores with respect to the application that has the file number 57-T-94001; (b) the Town of Kirkland Lake with respect to the application that has the file number 54-T-89003; (c) the Township of Matachewan with respect to the application that has the file number 54-T-86001.
content.raw_html:
1. The Minister’s authority under section 51 of the Act to approve plans of subdivision is delegated to,

(a) the Municipality of Huron Shores with respect to the application that has the file number 57-T-94001;

(b) the Town of Kirkland Lake with respect to the application that has the file number 54-T-89003;

(c) the Township of Matachewan with respect to the application that has the file number 54-T-86001.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
